name: Examples, Tests, and Tutorials
description:
As I work with Figma, I frequently come across different ways to achieve what I am looking to do. Whether it is a way to prototype something, or a setup for auto-layout that makes it easy to use later, I like to save those things for later, as well as share them with those who are looking to accomplish the same thing.


This is also the file where I create examples for when others ask how to do something. It will be an ongoing file that will be updated whenever I have a new example to add.


Feel free to message me if you would like to collaborate and add more to this file as well. hparamore@gmail.com.


Thanks!
